SEARCH
Package oogasalad.engine.controller

Class DefaultLevel

java.lang.Object
oogasalad.engine.controller.DefaultLevel
All Implemented Interfaces:
LevelAPI
public class DefaultLevel extends Object implements LevelAPI
Default implementation of the LevelAPI.

This class is responsible for selecting and loading a specific level from a given game, category, and level name. It uses a FileParserApi to parse the level file and delegates to the GameControllerAPI to update the engine with the parsed data.
